Title: Ultimagaming.co - Discord Application Website
Description: The frontend of SaaS wager project that displays user leaderboard and a rendered 3D scene of a throneroom for server event results.
Stack: MySQL, Django, Master CSS, Three.js, Nginx

Title: Discord Ethereum eSport Wagers
Description: A Discord application that utilizes the CQRS design pattern that seperates a centralized database and a Solidity smart contract which enables decentralized record keeping and the facilitation of wagering crypto between two users.

Title: pittman.in - Portfolio Website
Description: This website will continuously be iterated on. Check back in with time!

Title: Discord Internet Radio Streaming Bot
Description: (IN DEVELOPMENT) Allows user to search various internet radio stations and select one to stream into active voice channel. Other various discord bots exist as well.

Title: UNICRI - Main Site
Description: (Superbuff Contractor) Implemented a redesign of their main site.

Title: UNICRI - AI Innovation Toolkit
Description: (Superbuff Contractor) Developed a custom module that implements the innovation toolkit survey as decoupled drupal blocks.

Title: HR2DAY - Phaser.js
Description: (Superbuff Contractor) Point and click adventure game set in a HR enviroment. Handled sound design and QA in this game.

Title: Jumbo Tech Campus - Recruitment AR Game
Description: (Superbuff Contractor) AR Web game that used the gyroscope of the phone and within a Three.js Canvas, simulated movement patterns of geometries moving around the user. Implemented zig zag, flee, static, pivot, and random movement behaviors in 3D space using quartions..
